description: Students acquire the skills, knowledge and attitudes to become successful teachers in secondary
social studies classroom. They use the curriculum standards of the National Council for Social
Studies and those identified by the State of Minnesota to develop goals, outcomes, and assessments
for the various content areas.  Students acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings
necessary to address appropriate skills development in 5-12 social studies classrooms.  Required
field experience component.  Prerequisite: Education 330.  Offered annually in the spring
